title: Last goodbye
text:
I´m sitting here, nothing to do
and all I can think of is you
Those words you said makes me cry
but I always want another try
I´m standing here infront of you
asking you what you want me to do
You beg for another try
but I refused and watched you cry
You said that without me you would die
and that was the last goodbye.
Ef það eru stafsetningarvillur, endilega látið mig vita ;)
